item.title: Annotated Release Notes: vpype 1.9
item.description: vpype 1.9 is finally out! ðŸŽ‰ I recently stumbled upon a post by Simon Willison where he promotes the idea of annotated release notes. As it turns out, this release is, by any metric I can think of, the biggest and most transformative so far. The associated change log is consequently rather unwieldy and calls, you guessed it ðŸ’¡, for the present annotated release notes. (Note: although the original release notes are extensively quoted in this article, I reshuffled and shortened the original material.
